1.title: Episode #7.1
1.plot: In the season premiere, Ronnie is heartbroken when Bobby leaves Lizard Lick to start his own towing company.

2.title: Episode #7.2
2.plot: Amy comes to the rescue of Krazy Dave and Juicy when they bungle a repo... and Ron secretly lends a hand to Bobby's new business when Cassie fails to deliver the start-up cash.

3.title: Episode #7.3
3.plot: In a desperate move, Cassie turns to Ron for bailout money for Bobby's new business.

4.title: Episode #7.4
4.plot: Cassie pressures Bobby to move in with her... and cousin Johnny blows a big repo while Ronnie recuperates from his beat down.

5.title: Episode #7.5
5.plot: Bobby's plan backfires when he seeks revenge for Ronnie's beatdown... and Amy takes a licking in a nasty brawl.

6.title: Episode #7.6
6.plot: Ronnie comes to the rescue during a fiery repo... while things really heat-up between Juicy and Earl.

7.title: Episode #7.7
7.plot: Bobby ponders selling his new business to rejoin the Lizard Lick crew... and Ron's father, "Pops," asks Bobby to help him on a giant repo job that can land everyone in a ton of dough.

8.title: Episode #7.8
8.plot: Krazy Dave makes an unsettling discovery about his 25-year marriage... and Ron allows Bobby to return to the Lick-but with two bizarre conditions.

9.title: Episode #7.9
9.plot: Ron sets a trap to uncover the identity of a dangerous stalker while Bobby and Johnny take a wild ride on a four-wheeler to catch a debtor.

10.title: Episode #7.10
10.plot: Cassie forces Bobby to make a decision about the future of their relationship...and an innocent prank jeopardizes Krazy Dave's wedding.

11.title: Episode #7.11
11.plot: A fight at Dave's wedding threatens to explode Bobby's relationship with Cassie... while Ron races to discover a stalker menacing his family.

12.title: Episode #7.12
12.plot: Bobby strikes-out with a bunch of bridesmaids when he repos their party bus... while Ron sets-up a stakeout to catch a dangerous stalker.

13.title: Episode #7.13
13.plot: Krazy Dave is trapped in a submerged car when a repo goes horribly wrong... while Bobby and Juicy face tough decisions deciding their futures at Lizard Lick.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A dangerous tattooed man's car is targeted for repossession in the premiere of this series following a repo business in Lizard Lick, North Carolina.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Ron & Bobby must repossess a car from a guy who opens fire on them. Amy takes to the streets to retrieve a cable van. Ron's dog is taken by an angry repossessee.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Amy wants to have a baby. She also punches a debtor who demands the return of his truck. Ron is late for his date with Amy due to a late evening repo.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Ronnie and Bobby are attacked by a car owner throwing explosives at them.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Ron and Bobby head to a stock car track to repossess a flatbed and truck from a racecar driver.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Ron and Amy host a pig roast, and while at the party, Bobby spots a car up for repo. The guys go to Miami to repo a boat. Amy confronts a man in the office with just a few days left till her due date for the baby.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Ron and Bobby repo a tricked-out truck from a wannabe military man. Then, back at the office, Ron and Amy grow annoyed as Bobby becomes distracted by his personal life. Finally, a repo gone bad in a rough part of town sends Ron to the ER.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Tensions rise as Bobby denies involvement with his ex. The team goes after landscapers who haven't paid for their fancy lawn mowers. Ron and Bobby get a car that is held hostage. Ron and Amy find a surprise that could change Lizard Lick.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Tensions are high between Bobby and Amy after their confrontation at the diner. Ron puts Bobby in a sticky situation at a motel when the boys set up a sting on a sexy escort. Amy finds an interesting video in Ron's inbox.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: The boys get caught up in a dangerous situation when they head out to the boonies to repo a truck from a bunch of moonshiners. Ron throws Bobby a party in his honor, but a surprise guest puts a kink in Ron's plans.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Tensions rise as Ron gives Bobby an ultimatum that could change Lizard Lick Towing forever. A lien holder brings unsettling news as rumors swirl around Lizard Lick. A surprise guest throws a wrench in Ron's plan to mend his family ties.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: On this exciting season finale, Ron tells Bobby he has to choose between his family at The Lick and his ex. After the repo of an arsenal of yard equipment, Bobby and Ron have a confrontation that will change Lizard Lick Towing forever.

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: A new chapter begins in the Lizard Lick saga as Ron recovers from his stabbing. With Ron not up to full strength, he and Amy enlist some new help. When a surprise visitor arrives, the fate of Lizard Lick Towing hangs in the balance.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Tensions rise when Ron is forced to go on some jobs with Bobby. They head out to repo a tractor from a group of enraged farmers. Later, they go after a car that is under the protection of a fight promoter and his violence-prone bodyguard.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: As bills pile up, Ron and Bobby must take on high-risk repos. Bobby is set on revenge when his childhood bully's car comes up for repo. Ron gets a visit from his fuel distributor, who urges Ron to pay the bill or risk losing him as a source.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Tensions rise when Ron defies Amy and listens to Bobby's big plan to get them out of debt. Ron and Bobby go on a high-stakes repo that leaves Bobby in a compromising situation. Bobby's kind heart leads him to repo more than just a c

5.title: Episode #2.5
5.plot: Dwight sets the stakes for the New Orleans trip as Ron and Bobby scramble to tie up loose ends around the office. Ron and Bobby enlist the help of Big Juicy for a tricky repo. A traumatic accident leaves Ron and Bobby's trip in jeopardy.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Tensions mount as Ron's knee injury puts a kink in their plans to go to New Orleans. Ron, Bobby and Amy work together on a tricky motorcycle repo, and a van repo turns violent when a surprise rolls into Ron and Bobby's lap.

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: Ron and Bobby's trip to the Big Easy starts off with a bang. When they are sent to repo a fan boat, they end up on the wrong end of rifle-wielding swamp people. Amy's suspicions about Dwight lead her to make a crucial decision.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: Lizard Lick Towing's jobs in New Orleans get even stranger. The boys go to an abandoned warehouse to repo a semi trailer from a family of eccentrics, and Amy assists on a job to repo a hearse from unscrupulous gangbangers.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: After a disastrous end to their New Orleans trip, Ron and Bobby battle over how to deal with Dwight. The boys head to Make-Out Point to repo a car, and Bobby suffers a devastating setback that puts the future of the business in jeopardy.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: With Bobby's truck up in flames, he's out for revenge, and it's up to Ron to hold The Lick together. Ron and Bobby head to a den of criminals to repo a vehicle, and a huge job lands in the boys' lap: 25 cars in three hours for 30 grand.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Ron heads to Bobby's house to drag him out of bed for a potentially nasty repo. With Ron and Bobby still trying to get out from under Dwight's shadow, they get called out on a repo that could end with someone in the back of a police car.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: Ron faces his first day out of jail with new resolve to atone for his past sins. Bobby and Ron head to the backwoods to repossess some tricked-out rims, and the Lizard Lick office gets buried under its toughest challenge yet.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: As Ron and Amy make plans to renew their wedding vows, Bobby plans a wild bachelor party. A sneaky debtor leads Ron and Bobby on a wild goose chase. Bobby comes across a repo that could cause him to miss Ron and Amy's big day.

14.title: Episode #2.14
14.plot: A new chapter begins in the Lizard Lick saga!? Ron and Bobby get attacked by a group of angry biker women.? Then, their plans get bulldozed when the angry owner of a steamroller comes around looking for revenge.?

15.title: Episode #2.15
15.plot: Tensions rise at the Lick as Ron's old friend Johnny pushes a wedge between the Lizard Lick crew.? First, when the boys go to repossess a sedan from a crazed karate expert, Bobby takes a hit that could put him down for good.?

16.title: Episode #2.16
16.plot: Ron decides to bring his ex-con cousin, Johnny, onto the Lizard Lick team and ignites a massive firefight with Amy and Bobby. First, Ron and Bobby pull a fast one on college kids at a party.? Then, Johnny tries to win over Amy by helping her kids sell candy bars to help fund a church camp...

17.title: Episode #2.17
17.plot: While Johnny puts the moves on Amy, Ron and Bobby get caught up in a civil war reenactment.? First, Johnny's indecent proposal sends Amy into a frenzy to find Ronnie.

18.title: Episode #2.18
18.plot: Ronnie plans a big team outing to the beach for some greatly needed R&R. But first, Ron and Bobby get caught in an old fashioned barn burner that leaves them running for the exits!?

19.title: Episode #2.19
19.plot: Ron's bad bet turns the tables and makes Bobby his boss! The first repo stinks-- and lands Ron into the dumps. Later, Ron and Bobby battle a band of crazed mountain folk that has them yelling, "Run from the hills!"

20.title: Episode #2.20
20.plot: Bobby is flying on cloud nine until an airplane repo leaves him gasping for air.

21.title: Episode #2.21
21.plot: Ron and Bobby grind Amy's gears when they leave her home alone for some fun at a classic car show-- but the boy's day hits a road bump when Ron and Bobby spot a vintage MG sports car that's up for repo.

22.title: Episode #2.22
22.plot: A pet shop repo has Bobby scaling the walls... while Amy's intense MMA fight training has her absent at work and threatens the marriage.

23.title: Episode #2.23
23.plot: "Ron and Bobby go for a "Hail Mary" when a football coach has his truck reposessed-- but not before Ron gets stuck sleeping on the couch when he refuses to support Amy in her upcoming MMA brawl.

24.title: Episode #2.24
24.plot: With the help of veteran NASCAR driver Elliott Sadler, Ron, Bobby and Amy play a prank on rookie racer, Austin Dillon-but not until a mysterious man starts stealing business from the Lizard Lick crew.

25.title: Episode #2.25
25.plot: A big shot offers to buy Lizard Lick Towing-- but when Ron refuses the proposition, the mysterious money man wages an all-out war on the Lick Crew!

26.title: Episode #2.26
26.plot: In the season finale, Repo Ron is about to either make the biggest jackpot of his life -- or the biggest mistake of his life -- when a hyper aggressive competitor makes an offer to buy Lizard Lick.

1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Ron deals with the aftermath of his hasty decision to sell Lizard Lick Towing: the new owner threatens to put the whole crew out of a job.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: In this episode, the fate of Lizard Lick Towing is finally revealed!

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Ron and Bobby are about to embark in their new careers as security guards for a mystery celebrity.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: Before Ron and Bobby can start their very first security detail protecting Wrestling Superstar Ric Flair at a charity event, the boys are forced into a deadly game of chicken at a BMX bike race track.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: Bobby has big plans to get into the restaurant business when a food truck goes on the auction block-- but will Ron and Amy jump on board as partners?

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Krazy Dave's family reunion threatens to ruin the debut of Ron and Bobbie's food truck.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: A dangerous six-car repo mobilizes the entire crew.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: Ron and Bobby cowboy-up for a rough riding repo at a rodeo-- but not before Krazy Dave and Amy conspire to send the newly single Bobby on a blind date.

9.title: Episode #3.9
9.plot: Ronnie finds a surprise in a repo that has him reminiscing for his old dog Repo...But first, when a van comes up for repo at a little girl's beauty pageant, it leaves Bobby with sore shins... Ron threatens to ruin Bobby's first date with Cassie when a carnival ride comes up for repo. ?

10.title: Episode #3.10
10.plot: Krazy Dave gets an eyeful when a repo turns X-rated...but not before Amy sticks her nose into Bobby's love life and threatens to destroy their friendship.

11.title: Episode #3.11
11.plot: When big-time real estate developers threaten a local farmer with foreclosure, Ron steps-in to save his hometown from being bulldozed-- while Bobby fulfills a lifelong dream of sitting behind the wheel of a famous automotive TV icon!

12.title: Episode #3.12
12.plot: Ron discovers the campaign trail for Mayor is a rocky road when an old enemy resurfaces and attempts to sabotage his big debate.

13.title: Episode #3.13
13.plot: On the season finale of Lizard Lick Towing, the campaign trail heats-up when Ron's opponent for Mayor accuses him of wrongdoing and a horrible mishap threatens the team.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: In the season premiere, Bobby is rushed to the hospital after a horrific car accident while Ron and Amy wait desperately for news of their friend's condition.

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Cassie reveals a shocking secret to Bobby, while cousin Johnny tackles a repo that goes horribly wrong.

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Ronny is injured when his cousin Johnny botches a repo... and Cassie schemes to bilk money from Bobby's insurance-- but when Mayor Davis turns-up, someone walks away in handcuffs.

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: When the mayor of Lizard Lick accuses Bobby of stealing, Amy does some detective work to prove his innocence.

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: With Bobby injured, Ron is forced to have Krazy Dave help with a repo during a turkey hunt.

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Bobby is red-hot over a photo that might show Cassie in a compromising clinch with another man.

7.title: Episode #4.7
7.plot: The Lizard Lick boys are both in the dog house when Bobby finally confronts Cassie about her ex-husband... and Ron comes face-to-face with the man he suspects is trying to win Amy's heart.

8.title: Episode #4.8
8.plot: Ron and Bobby track-down an illegal bounty hunter with a history of violent behavior.

9.title: Episode #4.9
9.plot: While Bobby causes trouble at the police station, Amy digs-up more incriminating evidence against Mayor Sam Davis.

10.title: Episode #4.10
10.plot: Bobby goes too far when he confronts the man who broke into his house, and Krazy Dave attempts to single-handedly repo an 18-wheeler.

11.title: Episode #4.11
11.plot: Ron takes Amy on a second honeymoon.

12.title: Episode #4.12
12.plot: Ron's shoddy attempt at a second honeymoon gets him in hot water with Amy-and Bobby makes a mess of the business when he's left in-charge.

13.title: Episode #4.13
13.plot: On the season finale of Lizard Lick Towing, the campaign trail heats-up when Ron's opponent for Mayor accuses him of wrongdoing and a horrible mishap threatens the team.

1.plot: In the season premiere, Bobby is rushed to the hospital after a horrific car accident.

2.title: Episode #5.2
2.plot: Cassie reveals a shocking secret to Bobby.

3.title: Episode #5.3
3.plot: Ronny is injured when his cousin Johnny botches a repo.

4.title: Episode #5.4
4.plot: When Bobby is accused of stealing, Amy does some detective work to prove his innocence.

5.title: Episode #5.5
5.plot: With Bobby injured, Ron is forced to have Krazy Dave help with a repo.

6.title: Episode #5.6
6.plot: Bobby is red-hot over a photo.

7.title: Episode #5.7
7.plot: The Lizard Lick boys are both in the dog house when Bobby finally confronts Cassie about her ex-husband.

8.title: Episode #5.8
8.plot: Ron and Bobby track-down an illegal bounty hunter.

9.title: Episode #5.9
9.plot: Amy digs-up more incriminating evidence against Mayor Sam Davis.

10.title: Episode #5.10
10.plot: Bobby goes too far when he confronts the man who broke into his house.

11.title: Episode #5.11
11.plot: Ron takes Amy on a second honeymoon.

12.title: Episode #5.12
12.plot: Ron's shoddy attempt at a second honeymoon gets him in hot water with Amy.

13.title: Episode #5.13
13.plot: On the season finale of Lizard Lick, Ron and Amy compete for control of the business.

1.title: Episode #6.1
1.plot: In the season premiere, Ron and Amy's repo competition takes a dangerous turn when Amy goes missing... while Bobby's fate is sealed when the judge rules on his felony charges.

2.title: Episode #6.2
2.plot: Finding a Christmas tree takes a frightening turn when one of the Shirley children goes missing in the woods... and Bobby plays secret Santa to a family in need.

3.title: Episode #6.3
3.plot: Bobby confronts his past when he receives an invite for a "Back to the 80's party" and is forced to face his past tormentors.

4.title: Episode #6.4
4.plot: Bobby has to make things right with Juicy, and Amy and Ron try to help a single woman and 2 kids who they find sleeping in a vehicle they are trying to repo. At the end, things turn ugly when the owner of the vehicle turns out to be the woman's husband.

5.title: Episode #6.5
5.plot: The Lizard Lick crew reveal a life changing surprise for a homeless mother and her kids.

6.title: Episode #6.6
6.plot: Bobby confronts a female stalker on a hot first date.

7.title: Episode #6.7
7.plot: Ron and Bobby throw down in the middle of a scrap yard and later give a job to one of their debtors.

8.title: Episode #6.8
8.plot: Repo men Ron and Bobby face an explosive situation when they track down an illegal bounty hunter who has a history of violence.

9.title: Episode #6.9
9.plot: A theft at the Lick lot leaves Ron and Amy with a big mystery to solve -- and all clues lead to Big Juicy.

10.title: Episode #6.10
10.plot: The gang go after a car thief and deliver some Southern justice.

11.title: Episode #6.11
11.plot: In this brand new special, the Lizard Lick crew is taking a behind-the-scenes tour of their hometown, Lizard Lick. Ron, Amy and Bobby will visit their favorite hang-outs and hide-outs-- and introduce us to family & friends (and a few tall tales) along the way!

12.title: Episode #6.12
12.plot: Juicy's job is on-the-line when a car gets stolen from the Lick.

13.title: Episode #6.13
13.plot: Ron's business teeters on bankruptcy when his Dad threatens to cut ties... And Bobby is tempted to partner in a new big bucks venture.

14.title: Episode #6.14
14.plot: In the season finale, Bobby comes to blows with Ronnie when he secretly starts his own towing business.

locations: Lizard Lick Towing & Recovery - 2605 Hwy 97, Lizard Lick, North Carolina, USA
imdb.plot outline: Ron and Amy Shirley primarily repossess vehicles and machinery. Their clients are lien holders. Ron's role is to locate and repossess property, while Amy deals with irate owners who come demanding that their property be returned. Ron opened "Lizard Lick Towing" in 1998 with one truck. With Amy's help, the business grew over a period of 10 years to become a successful company with a staff of 15 and a fleet of 20 trucks. Ron, who is an ordained minister with a soft spot for people who have fallen on hard times, prepares a huge barbecue meal each year to help some of the people who have had their property repossessed by "Lizard Lick Towing".
imdb.title: Lizard Lick Towing
plot: Ronny opened Lizard Lick with one truck. The business grew over 10 years with Ronny's best friend Bobby.::ethansaunsers

Ron and Amy Shirley primarily repossess vehicles and machinery. Their clients are lien holders. Ron's role is to locate and repossess property, while Amy deals with irate owners who come demanding that their property be returned. Ron opened "_Lizard Lick Towing_ (qv)" in 1998 with one truck. With Amy's help, the business grew over a period of 10 years to become a successful company with a staff of 15 and a fleet of 20 trucks. Ron, who is an ordained minister with a soft spot for people who have fallen on hard times, prepares a huge barbecue meal each year to help some of the people who have had their property repossessed by "_Lizard Lick Towing_ (qv)".::Jiilo_Kim
